item.description:
AMERICAN CANCER SOCIETY NEEDS VOLUNTEERS ON MAY 29 2009

Location: Springfield College;263 Alden Street;Springfield; Ma
Contact Person: Crystal Brown: crystal.brown@cancer.org
Contact Person for the Singles/Meet Up: Ira Wettenstein. mistrchrming@aol.com 860-604-5792
DETAILS: I have signed up for the Survivor Dinner Wait staff. I will be leaving here at aprox. 4:30 from Windsor Locks. I can fit up to 4 people if you would like to Car Pool.
There are other Volunteer Activities listed below. What ever you can do, would be appreciated.
If you can volunteer, please let Crystal Brown know, so she can keep track. Please let me know as well if you would like to car pool.

Thanks,
Ira
Task: Survivor Dinner Waitstaff
Time: 5:30 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Responsibilities: Serve survivors, help with drinks, dessert.
Note: Please wear black pants and a white t-shirt.


Relay for Life Volunteer Opportunities for Survivor Activities
Total time needed-
Friday, May 29, 2009- from 2 p.m. – 9 p.m.
(In 2 hour shifts)
Friday, May 29, 2009
Location: Springfield College Track


Volunteers are needed to assist with various survivor activities for the 2009 Greater Springfield Relay For Life. To volunteer, email crystal.brown@cancer.org.

Task: Survivor tent decorator
Time: 2-4 p.m.
Responsibilities: Decorate survivor tent (all supplies provided)

Task: Registration Volunteer
Time: 4 p.m. – 6:30 p.m.
Responsibilities: Register survivors, distribute gifts, etc.

Task: ACS Patient Service Ambassador
Time: 4:30 p.m.- 7:00 p.m.
Responsibilities: Sign patients up to receive free services from the American Cancer Society.
item.how_to_find_us: Either Carpool from my home, or prearranged meeting points.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Greater Springfield Relay For Life. Volunteers Needed.
